title: Support E2E testing of product relocation and change processes part I
description:
Description
Process information:
Requirements:
Support E2E testing of product relocation & change processes.
Create test-automation scenarios for product relocation and change processes for oPOM
[Hint] Key user-touchpoints are Flamingo and EOS and key integration is with LOM (Fxn-mediator)
Solve bugs
Implement ad-hoc requirements stemming from E2E testing
Link for Documentation in Wiki:
oPOM testing of generic Product Change, please refer to:
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/BEMABU-1489%3A+Product+Change+in+O3
For Flamingo change order implementation, please refer to:
https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=2361048623 
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/Test+Data+and+Test+Cases
